The Frazier campaign cited a statement b: NRSC) as evidence for the claim that Michael Bennet votes for President Obama's agenda 98 percent of the time. The NRSC attributed the data to CQ Roll Call, a nonpartisan news service that tracks congressional data.
The NRSC: s statement also left out data for 2015, when Bennet backed the president's positions 89.7 percent of the time, according to CQ.
When including the 2015 voting data: Bennet's seven-year average of voting with the president is 96.57 percent, which is slightly lower than Frazier's claim of 98 percent.
